General.Name: Borosil Limited
General.Description: Borosil Limited operates as a glassware company in India. The company operates in two segments, Consumer Products and Scientific & Industrial Products. It provides science and industrial products, including laboratory glassware, instruments, disposable plastics, liquid handling systems, explosion proof lighting glassware, glass ampoules, and tabular glass vials under the LabQuest brand name that are used in pharmaceutical, research and development, education, and healthcare sectors. The company also offers primary packaging glass vials and ampoules under the Klass Pack name for pharmaceutical industry. In addition, it provides consumer glassware products, including microwaveable glassware products, glass tumblers, storage containers, stainless steel cookware, opal dining ware, kitchen appliances, lunch boxes, and stainless-steel flasks under the Borosil brand name. The company sells its products through traditional brick & mortar stores, large format retail platforms, online stores, and institutional sales. It also exports its products to approximately 50 countries. The company was formerly known as Hopewell Tableware Limited. Borosil Limited was founded in 1962 and is based in Mumbai, India.
